SELECT p.id, p.title, p.context, p.create_time, p.number, pl.id pl_id, pl.plate_name, (select COUNT(*) from t_comment where posting_id=p.id) commentCount FROM t_posting p,t_comment c,t_plate pl WHERE p.id=c.posting_id and p.plate_id=pl.id GROUP BY c.posting_id ORDER BY COUNT(c.posting_id) desc
limit #{page},#{row}

SELECT p.id id, p.user_id user_id, p.context context, p.title title, p.introduce introduce, p.create_time create_time, p.number number, u.nickname nickname, u.avatar avatar, p.new_time new_time, p.is_top is_top FROM t_posting p JOIN t_user u ON p.user_id = u.id
p.plate_id=#{plate_id} AND p.is_dele=1 and p.is_top=1
and p.title like "%"#{title}"%"
ORDER by p.new_time DESC

SELECT p.id id, p.user_id user_id, p.context context, p.title title, p.introduce introduce, p.create_time create_time, p.number number, u.nickname nickname, u.avatar avatar, p.new_time new_time, p.is_top is_top FROM t_posting p JOIN t_user u ON p.user_id = u.id
p.plate_id=#{plate_id} AND p.is_dele=1 and p.is_top=0
